GSD.description:
media: imx-jpeg: Prevent decoding NV12M jpegs into single-planar buffers

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit eff76b180751e5e55c872d17755680c3b83ba9ab. For more details please see the references link.
